H0.text: Purple is the flower color of all offspring when Mendel crossed purple‑flowered plants with white‑flowered plants.

H1.text: Blue is the color of all offspring when Mendel crossed purple‑flowered plants with white‑flowered plants.

H2.text: Red is the color of all the offspring when Mendel crossed purple‑flowered plants with white‑flowered plants.

H3.text: Yellow was the color of all offspring when Mendel crossed purple‑flowered plants and white‑flowered plants.

A4.text: the offspring in the first generation (F1-generation) were all purple-flowered

A5.text: the resulting flower colour was not a blend
